hotels.title: Canada: Alpine Jasper National Park Escape Near Mount Robson with Five Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Nestled on the shores of emerald-green Lac Beauvert, Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge is located in the heart of the Canadian Rockies, within Jasper National Park. This stunning resort features cosy cabin-style accommodations perfect for relaxing after a day of sun or snow adventure. The breathtaking natural backdrop will have you reaching for your camera at every turn. Treat yourself to world-class dining across five onsite restaurants, or wind down with a massage or personalised treatment at the soothing Fairmont Spa Jasper Park Lodge. Take a dip in the outdoor heated pool, or gather around a crackling fire pit under the star-filled sky. In the winter months, take a short walk to Mildred Lake, teeming with endless winter activities including four hockey rinks.
